'''Aranaga''' is a [[NPC]] from [[Sumeru]] who first appears in the ''[[The World of Aranara]]'' quest of the [[Aranyaka]] questline. He also appears in the [[Agnihotra Sutra]] World Quest series. He is a member of the [[Aranara]].

After completing ''[[Memory's Final Chapter]]'', he can be found in [[Vanarana]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Aranaga:''' Brings the flowing, invisible, untouchable... "Hope." A new Ashvattha.
:{{DIcon}} Hello...
::'''Aranaga:''' Hello, Nara (Traveler).
::'''Aranaga:''' You stopped the Marana, and helped the wilting forest to be lush again. Thank you, and... Soft-Fluffy White-Mushroom Floaty.
:{{DIcon}} See you...
::'''Aranaga:''' See you, Nara (Traveler).
{{Dialogue end}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Aranaga:''' Withered memories, and growing new friends... Like the Yajna Grass, Aranaga thinks.
:{{DIcon}} About the Yajna Grass...
::'''Aranaga:''' Already became dust in the wind, the Yajna Grass. Nara probably see it that way.
::'''Aranaga:''' But... It is radiant again from the forest plants, those already floated away, deeply buried, memories of green leaves with no trace... Every time new Yajna Grass grows new sprouts.
::'''Aranaga:''' Nara (Traveler) and White Floaty are the same. New friends, also old friends. Because have withered and are reborn.
:{{DIcon}} About "Mawtiyima"...
::'''Aranaga:''' Without the infestation of Marana, Mawtiyima will once again cover flowers and trees... after the moon rises and sets.
::'''Aranaga:''' Aranaga must thank Nara (Traveler) and White Floaty.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Aranaga:''' Bye, new friends.
{{Dialogue end}}
